N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 22.1 - Definitions

State Regulations

For the purpose of this Part, the following terms shall
have the designated meaning: (a) Facility shall mean a hospital, school, or alcoholism facility, as such terms
are defined in the Mental Hygiene Law, for the inpatient care and treatment of
the mentally ill, the mentally retarded, or the alcoholic. (b) Private facility shall mean a facility
which requires an operating certificate from the Commissioner of Mental

Hygiene. (c) Patient shall mean a
person receiving services in a facility. It includes a resident in a
school. Notes
